title: PlayStation Acquires a New Studio - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.29.22
description:
Greg is back and is joined by Blessing to talk some big PlayStation news (an acquisition), the possibilities of a Steam Deck 2, and Xbox Game Pass's family plan.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:57 - Housekeeping

This week, KFGD will be live on Youtube instead of Twitch as we experiment with a few things. So be aware and tune in live on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames for Kinda Funny Games Daily.

The Roper Report  -

00:11:18 - PlayStation has acquired a new studio!
00:32:47 - Ad
00:34:57 - Valve possibly has plans for future Steam Decks
00:42:02 - A new Mafia game is in development
00:48:55 - Xbox Game Pass 'Friends & Family' Logo has leaked
00:53:37 - Twisted Metal has wrapped filming!
00:47:46 - Out today
00:59:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Blessing
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
